page.title: 19FISHING IN CHELMSFORD
page.content: We are Andrew Layton and Lee Kirk;we attend Trinity Road Primary School.Our favourite pastime is fishing;it is one of the{most popular pastimes}in the country. We go fishing at{the Weir}on the River Chelmer,upstream from Victoria Road.We also fish in{the lake in Central Park. We have caught roach,perch,tench,dace, gudgeon,minnow and chub in these waters.All the fish take maggot bait except the tench which take sweetcorn. {We use}stainless steel and bronze hooks in sizes 2 to 24,nylon lines and glass fibre or carbon fibre rods,with a float to support the tackle in the water. If we were pike fishing we would use a spinning lure or a heavy pike float and wire trace before the hook.{We go fishing 4-5 times a week and would like to go fly fishing one day at the Hanningfield Reservoir.
